item.title: .NET AI Community Standup: Evaluate the Quality of Your AI Applications
item.description:
Bruno, Peter, and Shyam for an exciting online event where we‚Äôll dive into Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Evaluation, a powerful open-source .NET library designed to assess the quality and efficacy of LLM responses in AI applications. üéØ What You‚Äôll Learn: ‚úÖ How to measure AI response quality using built-in evaluators (coherence, relevance, equivalence, groundedness, etc.). ‚úÖ How to build your own custom evaluators and metrics for your specific AI use case. ‚úÖ How to leverage LLM response caching, evaluation result storage, and report generation to streamline AI evaluations. ‚úÖ Live demos and real-world examples to show you how to integrate these tools into your AI-powered .NET apps.
üîó Links: Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Evaluation: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/start-using-the-microsoft-ai-evaluations-library-today/ Collection: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/collections/yjwzhetrkjmdxw
üî• Whether you're an AI developer, .NET enthusiast, or just exploring AI quality metrics, this session is for you! Don‚Äôt miss out!
üéôÔ∏è Featuring: Bruno Capuano (@elbruno) Peter Waldschmidt (https://www.linkedin.com/in/peterwaldschmidt/), Shyam Namboodiripad
Connect with Bruno: https://www.linkedin.com/in/elbruno/
#AI #DotNET #LLM #AIEvals

item.title: Coffee and Open Source Conversation - Maxim Fateev
item.description:
Maxim has spent the last 25 years building massive distributed systems for Amazon, Microsoft, Google, and Uber. Among other things, he led the design and development of the AWS SQS backend, and AWS Simple Workflow Service. At Uber, Maxim led the effort on open source projects Cherami and Cadence Workflow. Since October of 2019, Maxim has been the CEO/Cofounder of Temporal Technologies. Its flagship open source project temporal.io is redefining the way large-scale reliable applications are developed and operated.
You can follow Maxim on Social Media https://www.linkedin.com/in/fateev https://x.com/mfateev https://github.com/mfateev
Also check out Temporal https://temporal.io/
PLEASE SUBSCRIBE TO THE PODCAST
- Spotify: http://isaacl.dev/podcast-spotify - Apple Podcasts: http://isaacl.dev/podcast-apple - Google Podcasts: http://isaacl.dev/podcast-google - RSS: http://isaacl.dev/podcast-rss
You can check out more episodes of Coffee and Open Source on https://www.coffeeandopensource.com
Coffee and Open Source is hosted by Isaac Levin (https://twitter.com/isaacrlevin)
item.author: (Isaac Levin)
